pages.text: $(#551012)TREPIDATION is a roguelike, meaning that resetting and starting new runs is expected and encouraged.$(br2)You can reset a run by clicking the Reset Run button on the pause menu (SP for singleplayer, MP for multiplayer).$()

$(#551012)When dying, you have to option to "Rebirth Nearby" which will spawn you 50-75 blocks from your death. Use this with caution.$(br2)You may have noticed a timer at the bottom left of your screen ticking down.$(br2)$(bold)Do not let that get to 0 or else $(obf)you will be sent to Limbo$()$(#551012).$()
$(#551012)You are given a few timer bonuses throughout your run to add more time. You can also find them scattered in the world.$()
